{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05142v1", "title": "Non-invertible symmetry as an axion-less solution to the strong CP
  problem", "summary": "We use a non-invertible symmetry to construct a three-zero texture for the
down-type quark mass matrix, which can resolve the strong CP problem without
invoking the axion, in four-dimensional spacetime with three quark families in
QCD. We assume CP invariance at the fundamental high-energy scale.", "main_category": "hep-ph", "categories": "hep-ph", "published": "2025-05-08T11:26:35Z"}
